mapper.insert: insert into cart_tbl(pro_num,m_id,cart_amount) values (#{pro_num} ,#{m_id} ,#{cart_amount}) on duplicate key update cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount}
mapper.select: select c.pro_num ,c.m_id ,p.pro_name ,p.pro_img ,p.pro_up_folder ,p.pro_price ,c.cart_amount,c.cart_amount * p.pro_price as unitprice from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.m_id = #{m_id}
select sum(p.pro_price * c.cart_amount) as total_price from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.m_id = #{m_id}
